data.why:
I am writing scripts and modules for use in Web application design.
    I have one CGI module already completed which I am considering
    uploading. It is a simple easy to use module for those who don't
    want the swiss army knife modules already supplied but need the core
    CGI functionality in a single module with no dependencies. Other
    projects I am working on are: a web templating module, and some
    modules working with XML specifically rss feeds and the like.
